Verses: 1 erigovin Aruge Yordhaanai Serndha Movaapin Samanaana Veligalile Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 isravel Puththirar Thangal Kaaniyaatchiyaagiya Sudhandharaththile Leviyarukkuk Kudiyirukkumpadi Pattanangalaik Kodukkavendum Endru Avargalukkuk Kattalaiyidu; Andhap Pattanangalai Soozhndhirukkira Velinilangalaiyum Leviyarukkuk Kodukkavendum.

3 andhap Pattanangal Avargal Kudiyiruppadharkum, Avaigalai Soozhndha Velinilangal Avargaludaiya Aadumaadugalukkum, Avargaludaiya Aasthigalukkum, Avargaludaiya Sagala Miruga Jeevangalukkum Kurikkappadavendum.
4 neengal Leviyarukkuk Kodukkum Pattanangalai Soozhndha Velinilangal Pattanaththin Madhilthodangi, Veliyile Sutrilum Aayiramuzha Dhooraththukku Ettavendum.

5 pattanam Maththiyil Irukka, Pattanaththin Velippuranthodangi, Kizhakke Irandaayiramuzhamum, Therke Irandaayiramuzhamum, Merke Irandaayiramuzhamum, Vadakke Irandaayiramuzhamum Alandhuvidakkadaveergal; Idhu Avargal Pattanangalukku Velinilangalaayiruppadhaaga.

6 neengal Leviyarukkuk Kodukkum Pattanangalil Adaikkalaththukkaaga Aaru Pattanangal Irukkavendum; Kolaiseydhavan Ange Thappi Odippogiradharku Avaigalaik Kurikkakkadaveergal; Avaigalaiyallaamal, Naarpaththirandu Pattanangalai Avargalukkuk Kodukkavendum.
7 neengal Leviyarukkuk Kodukkavendiya Pattanangalellaam Naarpaththettup Pattanangalum Avaigalai Soozhndha Velinilangalume.

8 neengal Isravel Puththirarin Sudhandharaththilirundhu Andhap Pattanangalaippiriththuk Kodukkumpodhu, Adhigamullavargalidaththilirundhu Adhigamum, Konjamullavargalidaththilirundhu Konjamum Piriththukkodukkavendum; Avaravar Sudhandhariththukkonda Sudhandharaththinpadiye Thangal Pattanangalil Leviyarukkuk Kodukkakkadavargal Endraar.
9 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
10 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Yordhaanaik Kadandhu, Kaanaandhesaththil Pravesikkumpodhu,
11 kaippisagaai Oruvanaik Kondru Pottavan Odippoyirukkaththakka Adaikkalappattanangalaaga Sila Pattanangalaik Kurikkakkadaveergal.
12 kolaiseydhavan Nyaayasabaiyile Nyaayam Visaarikkappadumun Saagaamal, Pazhivaangugiravan Kaikkuth Thappippoyirukkumpadi, Avaigal Ungalukku Adaikkalappattanangalaai Irukkakkadavadhu.
13 neengal Kodukkum Pattanangalil Aaru Pattanangal Adaikkalaththukkaaga Irukkavendum.
14 yordhaanukku Ippuraththil Moondru Pattanangalaiyum, Kaanaandhesaththil Moondru Pattanangalaiyum Kodukkavendum, Avaigal Adaikkalappattanangalaam.

15 kaippisagaai Oruvanaik Kondravan Evano, Avan Ange Odippoyirukkumpadikku, Andha Aaru Pattanangalum Isravel Puththirarukkum Ungal Naduve Irukkum Paradhesikkum Anniyanukkum Adaikkalappattanangalaai Irukkavendum.
16 oruvan Iruppu Aayudhaththinaal Oruvanai Vettinadhinaal Avan Seththupponaal, Vettinavan Kolaipaadhaganaayirukkiraan; Kolaipaadhagan Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
17 oruvan Oru Kallai Eduththu, Saagaththakkadhaaga Oruvanmel Erigiradhinaale Avan Seththupponaal, Kallerindhavan Kolaipaadhaganaayirukkiraan, Avan Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
18 oruvan Than Kaiyil Oru Mara Aayudhaththai Eduththu, Saagaththakkadhaaga Oruvanai Adiththadhinaal Avan Seththupponaal, Adiththavan Kolaipaadhaganaayirukkiraan; Kolaipaadhagan Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
19 pazhivaangavendiyavane Kolaipaadhaganaik Kollavendum; Avanaik Kandamaaththiraththil Avanaik Kondrupodalaam.
20 oruvan Pagaiyinaal Oruvanai Vizhaththallinadhinaalaayinum, Padhungiyirundhu Avan Saagaththakkadhaai Avanmel Edhaagilum Erindhadhinaalaayinum,

21 avanaip Pagaiththu, Than Kaiyinaal Adiththadhinaalaayinum, Avan Seththupponaal, Adiththavan Kolaipaadhagan; Avan Kolaiseyyappadavendum, Pazhivaangugiravan Kolaipaadhaganaik Kandamaaththiraththil Kondrupodalaam.
22 oruvan Pagaiyondrum Illaamal Sadudhiyil Oruvanaith Thalli Vizhappanninadhinaalaayinum, Padhungiyiraamal Yaadhoru Aayudhaththai Avanmel Pada Erindhadhinaalaayinum,

23 avanukkup Pagaignanaayiraamalum Avanukkuth Theengu Seyya Ninaiyaamalumirukkaiyil, Oruvanaik Kondrupodaththakka Oru Kallinaal Avanaikkaanaamal Eriya, Adhu Avanmel Pattadhinaalaayinum, Avan Seththupponaal,
24 appozhudhu Kolaiseydhavanaiyum Pazhivaangugiravanaiyum Sabaiyaar Indha Nyaayappadi Visaariththu,

25 kolaiseydhavanaip Pazhivaangugiravanudaiya Kaikkuth Thappuviththu, Avan Odippoyirundha Adaikkalappattanaththukku Avanaith Thirumbap Pogumpadi Seyyakkadavargal; Parisuththa Thailaththinaal Abishegam Petra Pradhaana Aasaariyan Maranamadaiyumattum Avan Adhile Irukkakkadavan.
26 aanaalum Kolaiseydhavan Thaan Odippoyirukkira Adaikkalappattanaththin Ellaiyai Vittu Velippattirukkumpodhu,
27 pazhivaangugiravan Kolai Seydhavanai Adaikkalappattanaththukku Veliye Kandupidiththuk Kondrupottaal, Avanmel Raththappazhi Illai.
28 kolaiseydhavan Pradhaana Aasaariyan Maranamadaiyumattum Adaikkalap Pattanaththilirukkavendum; Pradhaana Aasaariyan Maranamadaindhapinbu, Than Sudhandharamaana Kaaniyaatchikkuth Thirumbippogalaam.
29 ivaigal Ungal Vaasasthalangalilengum Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Ungalukku Nyaayavidhip Pramaanamaayirukkakkadavadhu.

30 evanaagilum, Oru Manidhanaik Kondrupottaal, Appozhudhu Saatchigaludaiya Vaakkumoolaththinpadiye Andhak Kolaipaadhaganaik Kolaiseyyakkadavargal; Ore Saatchiyaikkondumaaththiram Oru Manidhan Saagumpadi Theerppuchcheyyalaagaadhu.
31 saagiradharketra Kutranchumandha Kolaipaadhaganudaiya Jeevanukkaaga Neengal Meetkumporulai Vaangak Koodaadhu; Avan Thappaamal Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
32 than Adaikkalappattanaththukku Odipponavan Aasaariyan Maranamadaiyaadhadharku Munne Than Naattirkuth Thirumbivarumpadi Neengal Avanukkaaga Meetkumporulai Vaangak Koodaadhu.

33 neengal Irukkum Dhesaththaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkaadhirungal; Raththam Dhesaththaith Theettuppaduththum; Raththam Sindhinavanudaiya Raththaththinaaleyozhiya, Verondrinaalum Dhesaththile Sindhunda Raththaththirkaagap Paavanivirththiyillai.
34 neengal Kudiyirukkum En Vaasasthalamaagiya Dhesaththaith Theettuppaduththavendaam;karththaraagiya Naan Isravel Puththirar Naduve Vaasampannugiren Endru Sol Endraar.
